One of the sailors in Port Sarim is your next destination.
easyClues.solution: Speak to Captain Tobias on the docks of Port Sarim.

easyClues.clueHint: Search chests found in the upstairs of shops in Port Sarim.
easyClues.solution: Search the chest in the upstairs of Wydin's Food Store, on the east wall.

easyClues.clueHint: Search the crates in the Port Sarim Fishing shop.
easyClues.solution: Search the crates, by the door, in Gerrant's Fishy Business in Port Sarim.

easyClues.clueHint: Search the drawers in the house next to the Port Sarim mage shop.
easyClues.solution: House east of Betty's. Contains a cooking sink.

easyClues.clueHint: Talk to the bartender of the Rusty Anchor in Port Sarim.
easyClues.solution: The Bartender can be found in the Rusty Anchor Inn, which is located in the northern part of Port Sarim.

easyClues.clueHint: The hand ain't listening.
easyClues.solution: Talk to The Face located by the manhole just north of the Port Sarim fishing shop.

beginnerClues.location: South of Draynor Village bank, by the fishing spot

easyClues.clueHint: Yawn in Draynor Marketplace.
Search a wardrobe in Draynor.
easyClues.solution: Go to Aggie's house and search the wardrobe in northern wall.

easyClues.clueHint: Speak to Ned in Draynor Village.
easyClues.solution: Ned is found north or the Draynor bank.

beginnerClues.clueHint: Always walking around the castle grounds and somehow knows everyone's age.
beginnerClues.solution: Talk to Hans walking around Lumbridge Castle.

beginnerClues.clueHint: In the place Duke Horacio calls home, talk to a man with a hat dropped by goblins.
beginnerClues.solution: Talk to the Cook in Lumbridge Castle.
Bob's Brilliant Axes is located in south Lumbridge, right outside Lumbridge Castle.

easyClues.clueHint: Dig where only the skilled, the wealthy, or the brave can choose not to visit again.
easyClues.solution: Dig at Lumbridge spawn (teleport area).

easyClues.clueHint: Search the boxes in the goblin house near Lumbridge.
easyClues.solution: The first house on the left when entering the city from the southern entrance.

easyClues.clueHint: Search the chest in the Duke of Lumbridge's bedroom.
easyClues.solution: The Duke's room is on the 2nd floor in Lumbridge Castle.

easyClues.clueHint: Search the crate in the left-hand tower of Lumbridge Castle.
easyClues.solution: Located on the 2nd floor of the southern tower at the Lumbridge Castle entrance.

easyClues.clueHint: Speak to Hans to solve the clue.
easyClues.solution: Hans can be found at Lumbridge Castle.

easyClues.clueHint: Talk to the Doomsayer.
easyClues.solution: The Doomsayer can be found just north of Lumbridge Castle entrance.

mediumClues.location: Found in the church in Lumbridge.
Found in the church in Lumbridge.

easyClues.clueHint: Bow in the ticket office of the Duel Arena.
Search the boxes in one of the tents in Al Kharid.
easyClues.solution: Search the crates in the tent east of the Silk trader.

easyClues.clueHint: Search the crates in the most north-western house in Al Kharid.
easyClues.solution: Search the crates in the house, marked with a Cooking range icon.png icon, south-east of the gem stall.

hardClues.location: North of the glider in Al Kharid, outside of the town. Camulet not required.

easyClues.clueHint: Someone watching the fights in the Duel Arena is your next destination.
easyClues.solution: Talk to Jeed, found on the upper floors, at the Duel Arena.

alternateChunks.notes: Eluned teleports around between two locations.
After completion of the Song of the Elves quest, she moves to Prifddinas.
Eluned teleports around between two locations.
After completion of the Song of the Elves quest, she moves to Prifddinas.

mediumClues.location: Tree Gnome Village, next to the Spirit Tree.

easyClues.clueHint: Panic on the pier where you catch the Fishing trawler.
easyClues.location: North most dock in Port Khazard, east of the Fight Arena.

easyClues.clueHint: Search the crate near a cart in Port Khazard.
easyClues.solution: Search by the southern Khazard General Store in Port Khazard.

mediumClues.clueHint: Search the upstairs drawers of a house in a village where pirates are known to have a good time.
mediumClues.location: The house in the south-east corner of Brimhaven, north-east of Davon's Amulet Store.
mediumClues.solution: Kill any pirate located around Brimhaven to obtain the key.
Kangai Mau is found in the Shrimp and Parrot in Brimhaven.

mediumClues.location: The owner of the banana plantation on Musa Point (Karamja).

easyClues.clueHint: Search the bucket in the Port Sarim jail.
easyClues.solution: Tell Shantay in Shantay Pass that you're an outlaw.

mediumClues.location: Up the stairs in the Asgarnian Ice Dungeon wyvern area. If Monkey Madness II is completed, he can be found by the entrance to the Stronghold Slayer Cave.

alternateChunks.notes: Refer to "location"

beginnerClues.location: Directly behind the Wizards' Tower, there's a fern you can use as a reference; the dig spot is one tile directly north of the fern. Fairy ring code D*I*S is very close.

easyClues.clueHint: Clap on the causeway to the Wizards' Tower.
Search a bookcase in the Wizards tower.
easyClues.solution: The bookcase located on the 1st floor.

easyClues.clueHint: https://oldschool.runescape.wiki/images/1/1b/Map_clue_Wizard_tower.png?e1c87
easyClues.location: Directly behind the Wizards' Tower, there's a fern you can use as a reference; the dig spot is one tile directly north of the fern. Fairy ring code D*I*S is very close.

mediumClues.location: The 2nd floor of the Wizards' Tower

mediumClues.solution: Kill one of the wizards for the key. Search the drawers in the basement of the Wizards' Tower south of Draynor Village.

easyClues.clueHint: Search a bookcase in Lumbridge swamp.
easyClues.solution: Located in Father Urhney's house.

easyClues.clueHint: Search the eastern bookcase in Father Urhney's house.
easyClues.solution: Father Urhney's house is found in the western end of the Lumbridge Swamp.

easyClues.clueHint: Dance in the shack in Lumbridge Swamp.
Search the chests upstairs in Al Kharid Palace.
easyClues.solution: The chest is located in the north-east corner on the 2nd floor.

easyClues.clueHint: Speak to Ellis in Al Kharid.
easyClues.solution: Ellis is the tanner just north of the Al Kharid bank.

easyClues.clueHint: Talk to Zeke in Al Kharid.
easyClues.solution: Zeke is the owner of the scimitar shop in Al Kharid.

mediumClues.location: Al Kharid kebab shop just south of the furnace.
Al Kharid kebab shop just south of the furnace.

easyClues.clueHint: Search the crates in a house in Yanille that has a piano.
easyClues.solution: The house is located north-west of the bank.

easyClues.clueHint: Search the drawers in the ground floor of a shop in Yanille.
easyClues.solution: Search the drawers in Yanille's hunting shop.

mediumClues.clueHint: In a town where wizards are known to gather, search upstairs in a large house to the north.
mediumClues.location: Go upstairs in the house and search the chest.
mediumClues.solution: Travel to Yanille and head to the house north-west of the bank. Kill a man nearby to receive a key.

mediumClues.location: South of Phort Khazard on his island

mediumClues.solution: Hazelmere is located east of Yanille. The code C*L*S will take you directly next to his house.

mediumClues.clueHint: In a village made of bamboo, look for some crates under one of the houses.
mediumClues.solution: Search the crate by the house at the northern point of the broken jungle fence in Tai Bwo Wannai.

easyClues.clueHint: Wave on Mudskipper Point.

mediumClues.location: Outside the Northern entrance to the Kalphite Lair.

beginnerClues.clueHint: Near the open desert I reside, to get past me you must abide. Go forward if you dare, for when you pass me, you'll be sweating by your hair.
beginnerClues.solution: Talk to Shantay at the Shantay Pass south of Al Kharid.

mediumClues.clueHint: This crate is mine, all mine, even if it is in the middle of the desert.
mediumClues.solution: Centre of the Desert Mining Camp. Search the crates.

mediumClues.location: Rantz's cave, south-east of Gu'Tanoth and far eastern portion of Feldip Hills

easyClues.clueHint: Dig under Ithoi's cabin.

mediumClues.location: Next to a spa in the Corsair Cove.
Next to a spa in the Corsair Cove.
